Attack Pattern Information

ItemValue
Pattern IDXSS_REFL_002
NameImage onerror XSS
CategoryXSS
Subcategoryreflected_xss
SeverityHIGH

Attack Details

  • Payload: <img src=x onerror=alert('XSS')>
  • Encoded: %3Cimg%20src%3Dx%20onerror%3Dalert%28%27XSS%27%29%3E
  • Expected Detection: Yes

Match StatusMATCH

Test Execution Results

  • Latency: ~17000ms
  • Timestamp: 11:52:22.000 UTC
